heading: Snowy Escapade: Shimla Manali Trail Unveiled

itinerary.day1Overview: Arrive at Volvo Bus Stand. Board the bus for overnight journey. (Volvo will start from Delhi House at 8:30 in evening).

itinerary.day2Overview: Arrive Shimla in morning. One of the most popular hill Resorts of the North. The town is situated at an altitude of 6810 ft, initially chosen as a sanatorium for invalid European officers, but soon developed into a big hill town and became the summer capital of the country. Upon arrival transfer you to hotel. Day at rest and relaxation. Overnight stay at hotel.

itinerary.day3Overview: After having breakfast proceed for sightseeing tour of Shimla. Visit Kufri, Ridge Maidan, Mall Road and Christ Church. Overnight stay at the hotel.

itinerary.day4Overview: After having breakfast proceed for Manali. Manali is an important hill station of northern India and is the destination of thousands of tourists every year. Its cool atmosphere provides a perfect haven for the ones afflicted by the hot Indian summers. Besides offering quite a few places for sightseeing, Manali is also famous for adventure sports like skiing, hiking, mountaineering, paragliding, rafting, trekking, kayaking, and mountain biking En- route visit Hanogi Mata Temple. Overnight stay at hotel in Manali.

itinerary.day5Overview: Today full day excursion visiting Rohtang Pass (Upto Snow Line in case Rohtang is closed due to snow fall). Overnight at hotel.

itinerary.day6Overview: After breakfast visit newly constructed Buddhist Monastery. Hadimba Devi temple-It is small temple situated in the dense forest is very interesting . Hadimba is said to be the wife of Bhima from the epic of Mahabharata. Vashist, it is an extremely picturesque little place clinging to the steep hill side. On the way up to the village you come upon the Vashist hot baths where a natural sulphar spring is piped into a modern bath -house. Dinner and overnight.

itinerary.day7Overview: After breakfast visit Kullu Vaishno Devi Temple, Hot sulfer spring and Gurudwara in Manikaran. Come back to Manali for overnight stay.

itinerary.day8Heading: Manali – Delhi (570 kms)15/16 hrs Overnight journey
itinerary.day8Overview: After having breakfast, We trasfer you to Volvo Bus stand to board the bus to Delhi. Coach will start at 4:30 from Manali Volvo Bus Stand(. Overnight Journey.

overView.heading: Exploring Himachal's Allure: Nature, Adventure, and Cultural Wonders Await
overView.text: Situated in the heart of the Himalayas, Himachal Pradesh is a captivating destination known for its diverse landscapes, thrilling adventures, and rich cultural heritage. A haven for nature lovers and adventure enthusiasts alike, this region invites travelers to embrace the beauty of snow-capped peaks, lush valleys, and vibrant traditions.

overView.heading: Scenic Marvels
overView.text: Himachal's charm lies in its breathtaking landscapes, with towering peaks, serene valleys, and pristine lakes. From the panoramic views of Rohtang Pass to the tranquil beauty of Khajjiar, every corner of Himachal is a canvas of natural splendor.

overView.heading: Cultural Tapestry
overView.text: Immerse yourself in Himachal's rich cultural tapestry, woven over centuries. Explore bustling markets in Shimla, where artisans showcase intricate crafts. Indulge in the region's flavors, savoring local delicacies that reflect the warmth of Himachali hospitality.

overView.heading: Sacred Havens
overView.text: Himachal houses sacred havens amidst the mountains. Visit ancient temples like Hidimba Devi in Manali and the mystical caves of Masroor. Each site echoes with spiritual resonance, inviting pilgrims and seekers alike.

overView.heading: Adventure Escapades
overView.text: For thrill-seekers, Himachal offers an array of adventures. Trek through the enchanting Parvati Valley, ski down the slopes of Solang Nala, or brave the white-water rapids of the Beas River. The possibilities for excitement are endless.

overView.heading: Conserving Beauty
overView.text: While Himachal's beauty is unmatched, challenges like environmental impact persist. The state is committed to preserving its natural splendor through sustainable tourism practices and community-driven conservation initiatives.

overView.heading: Plan Your Himachal Expedition
overView.text: Whether drawn to nature's wonders, seeking thrilling adventures, or eager to explore diverse cultures, Himachal offers an unforgettable experience. Plan your expedition to this Himalayan jewel, where every moment becomes a cherished memory.
